articles.author: Owen Fernau
articles.description:
A key indicator shows traders started aggressively betting Arbitrum’s ARB token
would be airdropped hours before the token distribution was announced.  On March
15, a day before the airdrop went public, traders on prediction market
Polymarket started placing more bets that the airdrop would happen before March
31.  “Yes” shares spiked as high as $0.72 […]
articles.title: Betting Market for Arbitrum Airdrop Surges Before Announcement

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description:
The company behind TrueUSD, the fifth-largest stablecoin, moved $1B of the
company’s reserve assets to a Bahamas-based financial institution citing the
tumultuous state of the U.S. banking sector on Wednesday. Archblock, the firm
that oversees TrueUSD’s $2B in reserve assets, moved the funds to Capital Union
Bank. The Bahamas-based bank now holds $1.4B of the […]
articles.title: TrueUSD Moves $1B in Reserves To The Bahamas After U.S. Banking Failures

articles.author: Samuel Haig
articles.description:
Uniswap, the leading decentralized exchange, went live on BNB Chain following
months of infighting on Wednesday. Uniswap Labs announced the launch of its v3
protocol on BNB Chain, saying the blockchain “typically offers faster and
cheaper transactions than Ethereum,” making the exchange accessible to a broader
user base. BNB Chain, a blockchain created by the […]
articles.title: Uniswap v3 Launches On BNB Chain After Months of Infighting

articles.author: Jack Dunham
articles.description:
It was a wild weekend for stablecoins. USDC depegged from a dollar to as low as
$0.88 on Saturday, before bouncing fully back to its dollar peg on Monday. Today
we’re looking back over the wild weekend and figuring out what a depegged
stablecoin and failing banks could signal for DeFi.
articles.title: How Top Stablecoins Depegged After The Second Largest US Bank Failure

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Coinbase Received SEC Wells Notice The SEC sent a Wells notice to Coinabse regarding Coinbase's listed digital assets, including staking service Coinbase Earn, Coinbase Prime, and Coinbase Wallet after a cursory investigation. A Wells Notice is a notification issued by regulators to inform individuals or companies of upcoming enforcement actions. Coinbase states they will contest any enforcement in court.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase Received Wells SEC Notice, Sushi Served SEC Subpoena, ARB Airdrop Guide, and More...

articles.description: Magic Eden on Bitcoin Multichain NFT marketplace Magic Eden expands to Bitcoin, enabling users to trade Bitcoin NFTs without paying royalties (for now). Free Web3 Domain Based on your Twitter Handle Unstoppable Domains is a sponsor of Today in DeFi and a domain registrar that allows you to own domain names representing your unique identity or brand on web3.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Magic Eden on Bitcoin, Perpetual Hot Tub, Upcoming Airdrop, and More...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - Llama Drama Resolved, Immutable zkEVM, Farming on Conflux, and More...

articles.description: Replicated Security Live on Cosmos The Cosmos v9-Lambda Upgrade is completed and Replicated Security (the first version of Interchain Security) is now live. The upgrade will benefit the consumer chains with additional security and ATOM stakers will have more staking rewards.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Replicated Security Live on Cosmos, Shapella Live on Goerli, Automated LPing, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Euler Exploit Updates Euler was hacked for nearly $200M. due to a vulnerability that allowed the attacker to “create an unbacked token debt position by donating funds to the Euler’s reserves”. As a result, “the attacker was able to liquidate these underwater accounts and profit from the liquidation bonuses.”
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Euler Exploit Updates, Gearbox V3 Coming, Smart Contract Wallet, and More...

articles.description: Recap: Week of Mar. 6th

articles.author: Ellie
articles.description: Hedera HTS Exploit Attackers exploited Hedera and transferred away tokens from dApps using the Hedera Token Service (HTS). Hedera turned off mainnet proxies while the team is working on a solution. Convex Live on Polygon Convex is now live on Polyon. Initial pools including aMATICb+WMATIC, axlUSDC+USDC, CRV+amDAI+amUSDC+amUSD+amWBTC+amWETH, etc.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Hedera HTS Exploit, Convex Live on Polygon, Low-Risk Yield, and More...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - IndexCoop gtcETH Live, Maverick v1 Live, Tranched LPing, and More...

articles.title: Today in DeFi - LsETH Live, Compound V3 on Polygon, Yield Vaults on Optimism, and More...

ProtoRev is a revenue module that captures MEV as protocol revenue and is expected to generate $10k - $35k per $100m in DEX volume.

articles.description: Collab.Land Token Launch Collab.Land, a Discord/Telegram wallet connection bot protocol, will launch its token and enable claims on Feb 23 at 6 pm MT.
